website_summaries.verdict: With numerous wearers commending the shoe for its comfort and support, it could be said that the Nike LunarSolo has been true to its claims. Several runners agreed that the shoe was a suitable option for everyday runs, except for some who experienced fit and sizing issues. In summary, as a lightweight, versatile, and affordable shoe, the LunarSolo was a quality purchase.
pros: A reviewer wrote that the shoe helped correct their posture
Many customers thought the LunarSolo was an affordable shoe
A lot of commenters said the shoe is lightweight
The LunarSolo was a comfortable shoe, according to several users
The shoe did fantastic on the treadmill and during high-intensity interval training (HIIT) workouts, cited a wearer
One runner claimed the shoe offered adequate arch support
cons: Various wearers found the sizing to be small
The shoe was not as secure as expected, a buyer mentioned
The upper material has gotten stained with sweat, a couple of runners complained
Another user experienced the same after running in the rain

customer_reviews.title: RIPPED AFTER 3 WEARINGS
customer_reviews.text: We received these 6 days ago. My son has worn them three times. he wore them to his graduation party at school and both shoes ripped while playing basketball. super disappointing. I have to throw these away. Come on Nike.... your shoes should be able to get through some running around.
customer_reviews.author: Michigander

customer_reviews.title: Look and fit great
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers are really nice, they were a gift for my husband. The size is perfect. The only reason it did not get 5 stars is because the box was beat up and there was a small stain on the fabric part of the shoe. Since it was on the side I didn’t want to go through the hassle of returning since you couldn’t really tell. Other than that, these sneakers are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Piera Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I’m on my third set. I have all three pairs. Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.author: gnathicman

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe! My 14 year old son loves them and says they feel great on his feet. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Very light shoe but not soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit as I have ordered a black pair before but very disappointed with this order because of the green stain on the side of the shoe which is stands out because the colour is bright, Also this shoe is somehow not as comfortable as the other one,wonder if this is actually a fake!
customer_reviews.author: Abdul karriem

customer_reviews.title: Had a foot injury
customer_reviews.text: These allowed me to walk and nurse my foot.had pain under big toe for months before these helped me.
customer_reviews.author: damion

customer_reviews.title: Look good, feel good
customer_reviews.text: I use them for work where I walk a lot. They are comfortable, my feet don't hurt that much when I am done with my shift. I care a lot about looks also, and this pair go good with anything. They look cool unlike other work shoes. Overall, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Extremely comfortable and lightweight. Just have to make sure to not run in any water bc the material takes in water extremely easily
customer_reviews.author: Al Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. They are very comfortable and also work for when he dresses up.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Collard

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, not great
customer_reviews.text: Not super comfortable. Cloth on the top has already torn, only had them for roughly a month. They are great to stay tied.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable for walking or running
customer_reviews.text: Nike made this shoe for comfort. It is light weight with support.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to get these, I have nerve damage in my feet and they really helped with the pain and after less then 2 full weeks of wear the right foot tore around the big toe. I was bummed out but even thought they ripped so quick I still want another pair because of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan F.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool for high school.
customer_reviews.text: The heel-ankle could have a little more support and the laces could be a little longer, but very comfortable and the heel loop makes it easy to put on. Very stylish and cool for high school.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Smith Jr.

customer_reviews.title: and Very comfortable very stylish and I’m planning to get the red ...
customer_reviews.text: The light weight shoes , and Very comfortable very stylish and I’m planning to get the red ones in the blue works great you thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jack Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be better for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking Nike's, very comfortable to go to the gym and run! Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dominican Guy

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Not good if you need protection for toes... but great for running and casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: James Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Easy Tear.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shoe about a month ago, and it has already experienced a tear on the top of the shoe. I am physical education teacher and put moderate wear and tear on them, but a month into a shoe with a tear is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product size 13 M not Available would like to back order?? need shoe with dark bottoms!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as expected, color, size and fit. Very satisfied with this purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: You look at it online it looks good. But when you see the actual item, it’s too small.
customer_reviews.author: zelalem

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son he absolutely loves them. Fit just right and are comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: It was a great product I had this product before so I was just glad to get it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Carter

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: 14 year old son. Loves the fit and says they are comfortable and also loves the way they look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they fit perfect and he loves how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son, they fit perfect and he loves how comfortable they are!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Wrong gender
customer_reviews.text: They were supposed to be womens 11 but came in as mens
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very comfortable shoe, running and just regular workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Welch

customer_reviews.title: At least 3 sizes to SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this shoe, ordered in my normal nike size and it was too small, reordered in a size bigger and it was as small as the first one! WTF will not ever do this again
customer_reviews.author: John W Turner

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made shoe
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these I was stoked because they were extremely comfortable. However after 3-4 weeks of playing basketball and running around they’re already starting to fall apart. Not well made at all. Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he is a big fan. He wears them almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: trish

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Lunarsolo Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Men's Nike LunarSolo Running Shoe delivers softer-than-ever Lunarlon foam paired with a partial bootie upper for a smooth ride and sock-like fit. On the outsole, laser-cut pods provide multi-surface traction for out-of-this-world performance wherever you run
